thread.title: Rewards on offer as three European giants surprise

title: Rewards on offer as three European giants surprise
text:
Rewards on offer as three European giants surprise Thursday, February 08, 2018 - 01:47 
Several big European companies, including French bank Societe General and French oil major Total have posted better than expected results. As Sonia Legg reports, a trend towards higher dividends and share buy backs is also evident ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Several big European companies, including French bank Societe General and French oil major Total have posted better than expected results. As Sonia Legg reports, a trend towards higher dividends and share buy backs is also evident Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2EuNN2s
